postCreateCommand:
bash -lc '
set -euo pipefail

# System deps commonly needed for building Python wheels
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
  build-essential \
  curl \
  git \
  pkg-config \
  libffi-dev \
  libssl-dev

# Claude Code CLI
npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code

# Install Poetry via pipx (isolated, reliable)
python -m pip install --user --upgrade pip pipx
python -m pipx ensurepath
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"

# Install/upgrade Poetry (idempotent)
if command -v poetry >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  pipx upgrade poetry || true
else
  pipx install poetry
fi

# Ensure Poetry uses the devcontainer Python
poetry env use "$(command -v python)" || true

# Install project deps (expects pyproject.toml in workspace)
poetry install
'
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -n "$ANTHROPIC_API_KEY" ]; then echo "Claude key present"; else echo "âš  Set ANTHROPIC_API_KEY or run claude login"; fi'
